channel.title: Adding Super Admin
channel.description:
i need to add super admin, i folowed a tutorial and added these Player.java
public int superadmin;
PlayerSave.java
} else if (token.equals("character-superadmin")) { p.superadmin = Integer.parseInt(token2);
and in PlayerSave.Java
characterfile.write("character-superadmin = ", 0, 20); characterfile.write(Integer.toString(p.superadmin), 0, Integer.toString(p.superadmin).length()); characterfile.newLine();
Now The only thing i need to know is how to make super admins Actually Do Stuff (Ex. Spawning, Making themselves into a npc?) Any Ideas

item.title: Adding Super Admin
item.dc:creator: @Uncalled Uncalled
item.description:
@Uncalled wrote:

At the top of your commands.java add this:


        if (c.superadmin == 1) 
        SuperACommands(c, playerCommand);
    
    }

After a sum of commands, add this:


    public void SuperACommands(Client c, String playerCommand)
    {

Add your commands after that.

That’d be easier then adding rights on every command.

Read full topic

item.title: Adding Super Admin
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

P A N I C:

change player rights on commands to whatever super admin’s player right is

You should learn to read the comments following the first post before posting.

Read full topic

item.title: Adding Super Admin
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Steve Epic Steve
item.description:
@Epic_Steve wrote:

I Vain I:

[quote author=usman555 link=topic=485578.msg3558016#msg3558016 date=1302040058]EDIT: Aw, Vain beat me to it.[/quote]This is my section. I beat everyone.

Except me sometimes

Also, you do realise you’re setting a new variable (integer) called superadmin not playerRights.
A player can either be a super admin or not. There’s no need for it to be an integer, make it a boolean then just use;

if(playerCommand.startsWith("item") && superadmin)

Read full topic

item.title: Adding Super Admin
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

[code=java]
if (playerCommand.startsWith(“yell”)) {
for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) {
if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) {
Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j];

			if (c.playerRights == 1){			
				c2.sendMessage("[Mod]"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
								+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
			}else if (c.playerRights == 2){						
				c2.sendMessage("[Admin]"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
								+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
			}else if (c.playerRights == 3){
				c2.sendMessage("[Co-Owner]"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
								+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
			}else if (c.isDonator == 1){
				c2.sendMessage("[Donator]"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
								+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
			}else if (c.superadmin == 1){
				c2.sendMessage("[Super-Admin]"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
								+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
	        	}	
		}
}

}[/code]

EDIT:

Aw, Vain beat me to it.

Read full topic

item.title: Adding Super Admin
item.dc:creator: @x1_att_ftw_x x1 att ftw x
item.description:
@x1_att_ftw_x wrote:

My yell command is this

[code=java]
if (playerCommand.startsWith(“yell”)) {
for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) {
if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) {
Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j];
if (c.playerRights == 1){

							c2.sendMessage("[Mod]"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
											+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
						}else if (c.playerRights == 2){						
							c2.sendMessage("[Admin]"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
											+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
						}else if (c.playerRights == 3){
							c2.sendMessage("[Co-Owner]"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
											+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
						}else if (c.isDonator == 1){
							c2.sendMessage("[Donator]"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
											+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
						}else if (c.superadmin == 0){
							c2.sendMessage("[Super-Admin]"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
											+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
					}	
					}
				}
			}[/code]

the problem is that when regular players yell it says Super-Admin beside their name like you said above thats goign to happen how can i make that not happen and how can i add Superadmin to Characters Files?and yes i did change the token

Read full topic

item.title: Adding Super Admin
item.dc:creator: @x1_att_ftw_x x1 att ftw x
item.description:
@x1_att_ftw_x wrote:

okay this is my command i get no errors but it doesent create a super admin…

if (playerCommand.startsWith("givesuper") && c.playerRights >= 3) { try { String playerToMod = playerCommand.substring(8); for(int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++) { if(Server.playerHandler.players[i] != null) { if(Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(playerToMod)) { Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[i]; c2.sendMessage("You have been given Super Admin status by " + c.playerName); c2.superadmin = 1; c2.logout(); break; } } } } catch(Exception e) { c.sendMessage("Player Must Be Offline."); } }
yet it doesent work…

try {
/if (c.inWild() || isInPVP()) {

int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]);

c.getItems().addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
} else {
